name: Lunar
description: Lunar is regarded as a chuunibyou sufferer. To carry out justice, she inspects thoroughly in every city. She has participated in countless battles and saved many people.

passiveSkill.name: Arrival of Justice
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "Partner of Justice arrives in a bad situation! Before Lunar arrives, if the total deaths of partners and summoned on both parties reach {placeholder}, Lunar's Energy will become {placeholder}."}

uniqueSkill.name: Destruction of Galaxy
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Lunar gathers a tremendous amount of energy and releases a penetrable shockwave to attack all enemies, dealing ATK* {placeholder} damage to enemies in the middle column and ATK* {placeholder} damage to enemies alongside."}

specialSkill.name: Flash Burst
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Lunar deals ATK* {placeholder} damage to all enemies.Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Knight Kicking
normalSkill.description: Deals {placeholder} of ATK damage to an enemy.

templateData.lens4.skill: Lunar gathers a tremendous amount of energy and releases a penetrable shockwave to attack all enemies, dealing ATK* {placeholder} damage to enemies in the middle column and ATK* {placeholder} damage to enemies alongside.
templateData.lens5.skill: Partner of Justice arrives in a bad situation! Before Lunar arrives, if the total deaths of partners and summoned on both parties reach {placeholder}, Lunar's Energy will become {placeholder}.
templateData.lens6.skill: Lunar deals ATK* {placeholder} damage to all enemies.Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}
